choices.choiceText: Base Flood Elevation (Feet, Mean Sea Level)

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: Are_you_submitting_the_application_under_the_ordinances_and_policies_in_effect_a
fields.fieldText: Are you submitting the application under the ordinances and policies in effect at the time the application is accepted for review by the Town of Clayton?

fields.name: Please_specify_the_ordinance_s_and_or_policy_ies_including_version_s_under_which
fields.fieldText: Please specify the ordinance(s) and/or policy(ies), including version(s), under which the application is being submitted?

fields.name: Brief_Description_of_Request
fields.fieldText: Brief Description of proposed use or development?

fields.name: Is_the_proposed_use_or_development_in_a_floodway
fields.fieldText: Is the proposed use or development in a floodway?

fields.name: If_yes_was_a_no_rise_certification_obtained
fields.fieldText: If yes, was a no-rise certification obtained?

fields.name: NAVD_1988_questions
fields.fieldText: The questions below use NAVD 1988 standards, where applicable

fields.name: Base_Flood_elevation_BFE_per_FIRM_at_development_site
fields.fieldText: Base Flood elevation (BFE) per FIRM at development site

fields.name: Regulatory_flood_elevation_at_development_site_BFE_locally_adopted_freeboard
fields.fieldText: Regulatory flood elevation at development site (BFE + locally adopted freeboard)

fields.name: Elevation_in_relation_to_mean_sea_level_MSL_at_which_bottom_floor_including_base
fields.fieldText: Elevation in relation to Mean Sea Level (MSL) at which bottom floor (including basement) will be constructed

fields.name: Will_garage_if_applicable_be_used_for_any_other_purpose_other_than_parking_vehic
fields.fieldText: Will garage (if applicable) be used for any other purpose other than parking vehicles, building access or household storage?

fields.name: Elevation_in_relation_to_Mean_Sea_Level_MSL_above_which_all_utilities_including
fields.fieldText: Elevation in relation to Mean Sea Level (MSL) above which all utilities (including heating, air conditioning and electrical equipment) will be installed

fields.name: Proposed_method_of_elevating_the_structure
fields.fieldText: Proposed method of elevating the structure

fields.name: Will_any_watercourse_be_altered_or_relocated_because_of_the_proposed_developmen
fields.fieldText: Will any watercourse be altered or relocated because of the proposed development?

fields.name: Description_of_the_extent_of_the_alteration_or_relocation
fields.fieldText: Description of the extent of the alteration or relocation

fields.name: Elevation_in_relation_to_Mean_Sea_Level_MSL_in_which_structures_shall_be_floodpr
fields.fieldText: Elevation in relation to Mean Sea Level (MSL) in which structures shall be floodproofed
